name: Pocahontas Movie
shortdescription: An unlikely hero finds their home in the 'new world'
text: +title: In +timeperiod, a ship carrying +maincharacter1 arrives in the lush „new world“ of +location. The +rogueelement are mining for +mineral; under supervision of +badguy. +maincharacter1 begins to explore the new territory, and encounters +maincharacter2. Initially she is distrustful of him, but a message from +sidekick helps her overcome her trepidation. The two begin spending time together, +maincharacter2 helps +maincharacter1 understand that all life is valuable, and how all nature is connected circle of life. Furthermore she teaches him how to hunt, grow crops, and of her culture. We find that her father is +supportingcharacter1, and that she is set to be married to +supportingcharacter2, a great warrior, but a serious man, whom +maincharacter2 does not desire, Over time, +supportingcharacter2 tries to kill +maincharacter1 out of jealousy, but he is later killed be the +rogueelement. As the +rogueelement prepare to attack, +maincharacter1 is blamed by the locals, and sentenced to death. Just before they kill him, the +rogueelement arrive. +supportingcharacter1 is nearly killed, and +maincharacter1 sustains injuries from badguy, who is then brought to justice. +maincharacter2 risks her life to save +maincharacter1.
ending: +maincharacter1 and +maincharacter2 finally have each other, and the two cultures resolve their differences.
alternative: In a shocking twist, +maincharacter1 and +maincharacter2 tragically die fighting as the enemy is victorious over the natives.

name: Survivor Lost
shortdescription: Disaster on a maiden voyage with a love interest
text: +title: The sound of wind breezes as the camera pans from left to right. We see a character holding a piece of tattered clothes, looking onto the horizon, over the +location. +timeduration earlier, we see the same character rushing down the stairs, waving goodbye to their loved ones and leaving out the door in a hurry. A +transportmode is being loaded with cargo and passangers, we see +maincharacter being in the crowd about to enter. The +transportmode is a marvel of its kind, a ultramodern way of transportation for the time, with all the comforts that one would want. On the +transportmode +maincharacter befriends +supportingcharacter after they found themselves drinking +drink at the bar. They tell each other about their travel stories, their lives and ambitions and quickly fall for each other romantically. Meanwhile, in the control deck, all seems calm. The commander of +transportmode insists that safety regulations be ignored to make the trip faster. Unfortunately, this results in the crew not noticing +rogueelement. The +transportmode inevitably crashes into +rogueelement and all seems lost. Daylight sweeps over +location as the few survivors scramble to escape the remnants of +transportmode. We see +maincharacter embracing the lifeless body of +supportingcharacter as tears become heavy. +timeduration go by without any help from others. +maincharacter, amongst the few survivors that remain has lost all hope.
ending: Then, unexpectedly, we see another +transportmode shining its lights on the +location as the screen fades to black.
alternative: We see +maincharacter just like they were in the beginning of the movie, embracing the cloth, presumably of +supportingcharacter. The screen cuts to black, as the tattered remains escape their hands, and the fate is unknown.

name: The Last War
shortdescription: A historical adventure of love, betrayal and redemption
text: +title: Set in the +timeperiod times and in +location, the story of a once-powerful +role1 is seen commanding his +armytype, leading them to victory in yet another battle. Meanwhile, in the capital of +location, +badguy is enraged when he is passed over as their heir in favour of his father's favorite +role1. He kills his father and arranges the murder of the role1 's family. Oblivious to +badguy's motives, +role1 continues his campaign only to be caught by surprise of the changing plans for his future. He is sold into slavery to be trained as a +role2 - but his subsequent popularity in the +activity lets him on a path towards salvation. +role2 becomes friends with many other people sharing his fate, and with their help he finally becomes an audience with the +badguy during a celebration in the capital of +location. After a successful fight in +activity, he kneels before +badguy and reveals himself to be +role1. Shocked and dumbfounded, +badguy enters the Arena and challanges +role1. After an intense fight, +badguy succumbs to their injuries and dies. +role1 is pronounced victorious, and their claim to the throne of +location is offered.
ending: +role1 stands wearily, having suffered many injuries himself, and sees his family in a vision. He decides to join them, as his now weak body drops to the floor of the Arena, as the camera pans upwards into the sky.
alternative: +role1 stands wearily, overlooking the cheering crowd around him. He gathers his strength to show the crowd a +sign, marking the beginning of his reign over +location as the screen moves up showing the crowd and the capital.

name: Horror Cabin
shortdescription: Three friends go on a secluded holiday. Things don't turn out as they expected.
text: +title: Three college friends, +character1, +character2 and +character3 decide to take a vacation in the remote area of +location, where their +relative has a +housingtype. After some planning they take their +vehicle to the +location where they intend to have a nice time. After arriving they notice something strange about +housingtype but do not draw any attention to it. Night comes, and the +location starts to slowly reveal its true colors. After a fun party the friends are woken up by a strange noise. They try to look around but have trouble doing it as the power is out. The atmosphere is becoming more menacing by the hour, and the friends decide to leave. Outside they see that their +vehicle has wanished without any trace. +character2 becomes paranoid that they all will die, and runs off into the woods. +character1 and +character3 chase after them, but fail to find them. After some time they discover their body with +weirdweapon sticking out of them. Horrified, they return to the cabin, where they can hear footsteps. +character2 becomes convinced that it is +character3 that killed +character1, so they find +weirdweapon and try to kill them. +character3 defends themselves successfuly by killing +character2 first using +weirdweapon. In shock, they realize what they have done, only to see a strange shadowy figure in the hallway of the house. Laughing maniacally, it appears to be +relative who proceeds to attack +character2 with a +weirdweapon.
ending: +character2 manages to survive by jumping out of the window, running to +character1's body, grabbing +weirdweapon and killing +relative as they lunged at him.
alternative: +character2 manages to survive by jumping out of the window, only to be impaled by the still living +character1's +weirdweapon, menacing laughter echos through the +location as the screen turns to black.
